snippet.title: [D3Publisher] Kurayami no Hate de Kimi o Matsu
snippet.description:
New suspense otome game from D3Publisher.

The heroine is stuck with six guys in the middle of no where in a school building. These six guys include a student teacher, a teacher and couple of students and they have to escape while a killer, known as Kamen no Shinigami begins to attack them. It has puzzle component to it so in order to escape, you and one of the guys have to solve puzzles and collect items.

But thats not all...

One of the six guys is the KILLER
